name: hinterland
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C usually singular ] the land behind the coast or the banks of a river, or an area of a country that is far away from cities hinterlands [ plural ] US
a part of the country that is far away from the big city areas: He worked as a missionary for many years in the hinterlands of Africa.

Towns & regions: the countryside
Add to word list
Add to word list
a region in the middle part of a country, esp. a large country, that is far from cities or the coast: The touring theater group took its production into the hinterland.
Add to word list
Add to word list
the area that surrounds a big city or port and on which the city or port depends for economic growth: China is Hong Kong's economic hinterland and biggest trading partner.
